Class VirtualServerSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Server.VirtualServerSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualServer, Remote
public class VirtualServerSocket extends Object implements VirtualServer
Implementation of the VirtualServer interface that uses an ObjectOutputStream to send messages to the server. This class is used for RMI communication between the client and server.
